channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Border arrests are little changed in December, ending Biden’s term at lowest level
item.description: A U.S. official says arrests for illegally crossing the border from Mexico in December are little changed from a month earlier.

item.title: Jimmy Carter: Many evolutions for a centenarian ‘citizen of the world’
A guide to funeral services for former President Jimmy Carter
